answer:
There is no central registry of all immunizations provided in BC.  You can find information on locating immunization records here.
Immunization Nurse
question: I checked my childrens immunization record online. I am unable to see which vaccinations they have had. Where can i get a copy of all their vaccinations up to date? Why isn't all this information kept in one place? it"s all attached to care card numbers? Frustrating!!!!
